CustomInputEvent.name: CustomInputEvent
CustomInputEvent.doc: Called when a CustomInputPrototype is activated.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that activated the custom input.

input_name.name: input_name
input_name.doc: The prototype name of the custom input that was activated.

cursor_position.name: cursor_position
cursor_position.doc: The mouse cursor position when the custom input was activated.

cursor_display_location.name: cursor_display_location
cursor_display_location.doc: The mouse cursor display location when the custom input was activated.

selected_prototype.name: selected_prototype
selected_prototype.doc: Information about the prototype that is selected when the custom input is used. Needs to be enabled on the custom input's prototype. nil if none is selected.

on_ai_command_completed.name: on_ai_command_completed
on_ai_command_completed.doc: Called when a unit/group completes a command.

unit_number.name: unit_number
unit_number.doc: unit_number/group_number of the unit/group which just completed a command.

was_distracted.name: was_distracted
was_distracted.doc: Was this command generated by a distraction.

on_area_cloned.name: on_area_cloned
on_area_cloned.doc: Called when an area of the map is cloned.

on_biter_base_built.name: on_biter_base_built
on_biter_base_built.doc: Called when a biter migration builds a base.

on_brush_cloned.name: on_brush_cloned
on_brush_cloned.doc: Called when a set of positions on the map is cloned.

on_build_base_arrived.name: on_build_base_arrived
on_build_base_arrived.doc: Called when a defines.command.build_base command reaches its destination, and before building starts.

unit.name: unit
unit.doc: The unit the command was assigned to.

group.name: group
group.doc: The unit group the command was assigned to.

on_built_entity.name: on_built_entity
on_built_entity.doc: Called when player builds something. Can be filtered using LuaPlayerBuiltEntityEventFilter.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item prototype used to build the entity. Note this won't exist in some situations (built from blueprint, undo, etc).

tags.name: tags
tags.doc: The tags associated with this entity if any.

on_cancelled_deconstruction.name: on_cancelled_deconstruction
on_cancelled_deconstruction.doc: Called when the deconstruction of an entity is canceled. Can be filtered using LuaEntityDeconstructionCancelledEventFilter.

on_cancelled_upgrade.name: on_cancelled_upgrade
on_cancelled_upgrade.doc: Called when the upgrade of an entity is canceled. Can be filtered using LuaUpgradeCancelledEventFilter.

on_character_corpse_expired.name: on_character_corpse_expired
on_character_corpse_expired.doc: Called when a character corpse expires due to timeout or all of the items being removed from it.

on_chart_tag_added.name: on_chart_tag_added
on_chart_tag_added.doc: Called when a chart tag is created.

on_chart_tag_modified.name: on_chart_tag_modified
on_chart_tag_modified.doc: Called when a chart tag is modified by a player.

on_chart_tag_removed.name: on_chart_tag_removed
on_chart_tag_removed.doc: Called just before a chart tag is deleted.

on_chunk_charted.name: on_chunk_charted
on_chunk_charted.doc: Called when a chunk is charted or re-charted.

on_chunk_deleted.name: on_chunk_deleted
on_chunk_deleted.doc: Called when one or more chunks are deleted using LuaSurface::delete_chunk.

on_chunk_generated.name: on_chunk_generated
on_chunk_generated.doc: Called when a chunk is generated.

surface.name: surface
surface.doc: The surface the chunk is on.

on_combat_robot_expired.name: on_combat_robot_expired
on_combat_robot_expired.doc: Called when a combat robot expires through a lack of energy, or timeout.

owner.name: owner
owner.doc: The entity that owns the robot if any.

on_console_chat.name: on_console_chat
on_console_chat.doc: Called when a message is sent to the in-game console, either by a player or through the server interface.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the chatting, if any.

message.name: message
message.doc: The chat message that was sent.

on_console_command.name: on_console_command
on_console_command.doc: Called when someone enters a command-like message regardless of it being a valid command.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player if any.

command.name: command
command.doc: The command as typed without the preceding forward slash ('/').

on_cutscene_cancelled.name: on_cutscene_cancelled
on_cutscene_cancelled.doc: Called when a cutscene is cancelled by the player or by script.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player the cutscene was shown to.

on_cutscene_finished.name: on_cutscene_finished
on_cutscene_finished.doc: Called when a cutscene finishes naturally (was not cancelled).

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player the cutscene was shown to.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player the cutscene is being shown to.

on_cutscene_waypoint_reached.name: on_cutscene_waypoint_reached
on_cutscene_waypoint_reached.doc: Called when a cutscene is playing, each time it reaches a waypoint in that cutscene.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player index of the player viewing the cutscene.

waypoint_index.name: waypoint_index
waypoint_index.doc: The index of the waypoint we just completed.

on_difficulty_settings_changed.name: on_difficulty_settings_changed
on_difficulty_settings_changed.doc: Called when the map difficulty settings are changed.

on_entity_cloned.name: on_entity_cloned
on_entity_cloned.doc: Called when an entity is cloned. Can be filtered for the source entity using LuaEntityClonedEventFilter.

on_entity_color_changed.name: on_entity_color_changed
on_entity_color_changed.doc: Called after an entity has been recolored either by the player or through script.

on_entity_damaged.name: on_entity_damaged
on_entity_damaged.doc: Called when an entity is damaged. Can be filtered using LuaEntityDamagedEventFilter.

final_health.name: final_health
final_health.doc: The health of the entity after the damage was applied.

cause.name: cause
cause.doc: The entity that did the attacking if available.

force.name: force
force.doc: The force that did the attacking if any.

on_entity_destroyed.name: on_entity_destroyed
on_entity_destroyed.doc: Called after an entity is destroyed that has been registered with LuaBootstrap::register_on_entity_destroyed.

registration_number.name: registration_number
registration_number.doc: The number returned by register_on_entity_destroyed to uniquely identify this entity during this event.

unit_number.name: unit_number
unit_number.doc: The LuaEntity::unit_number of the destroyed entity, if it had one.

on_entity_died.name: on_entity_died
on_entity_died.doc: Called when an entity dies. Can be filtered using LuaEntityDiedEventFilter.

cause.name: cause
cause.doc: The entity that did the killing if available.

loot.name: loot
loot.doc: The loot generated by this entity if any.

force.name: force
force.doc: The force that did the killing if any.

on_entity_logistic_slot_changed.name: on_entity_logistic_slot_changed
on_entity_logistic_slot_changed.doc: Called when one of an entity's personal logistic slots changes.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who changed the slot, or nil if changed by script.

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: The entity for whom a logistic slot was changed.

slot_index.name: slot_index
slot_index.doc: The slot index that was changed.

on_entity_renamed.name: on_entity_renamed
on_entity_renamed.doc: Called after an entity has been renamed either by the player or through script.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: If by_script is true this will not be included.

on_entity_settings_pasted.name: on_entity_settings_pasted
on_entity_settings_pasted.doc: Called after entity copy-paste is done.

source.name: source
source.doc: The source entity settings were copied from.

destination.name: destination
destination.doc: The destination entity settings were copied to.

on_entity_spawned.name: on_entity_spawned
on_entity_spawned.doc: Called when an entity is spawned by a EnemySpawner

on_equipment_inserted.name: on_equipment_inserted
on_equipment_inserted.doc: Called after equipment is inserted into an equipment grid.

on_equipment_removed.name: on_equipment_removed
on_equipment_removed.doc: Called after equipment is removed from an equipment grid.

on_force_cease_fire_changed.name: on_force_cease_fire_changed
on_force_cease_fire_changed.doc: Called when the a forces cease fire values change.

force.name: force
force.doc: The force who's cease fire changed.

other_force.name: other_force
other_force.doc: Which force was added or removed.

added.name: added
added.doc: If the other force was added or removed.

on_force_created.name: on_force_created
on_force_created.doc: Called when a new force is created using game.create_force()

on_force_friends_changed.name: on_force_friends_changed
on_force_friends_changed.doc: Called when the a forces friends change.

other_force.name: other_force
other_force.doc: Which force was added or removed.

added.name: added
added.doc: If the other force was added or removed.

on_forces_merged.name: on_forces_merged
on_forces_merged.doc: Called after two forces have been merged using game.merge_forces().

source_index.name: source_index
source_index.doc: The index of the destroyed force.

destination.name: destination
destination.doc: The force entities where reassigned to.

on_forces_merging.name: on_forces_merging
on_forces_merging.doc: Called when two forces are about to be merged using game.merge_forces().

destination.name: destination
destination.doc: The force to reassign entities to.

on_game_created_from_scenario.name: on_game_created_from_scenario
on_game_created_from_scenario.doc: Called when a game is created from a scenario. This is fired for every mod, even when the scenario's save data already includes it. In those cases however, LuaBootstrap::on_init is not fired.

on_gui_checked_state_changed.name: on_gui_checked_state_changed
on_gui_checked_state_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement checked state is changed (related to checkboxes and radio buttons).

element.name: element
element.doc: The element whose checked state changed.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the clicking.

button.name: button
button.doc: The mouse button used if any.

cursor_display_location.name: cursor_display_location
cursor_display_location.doc: The display location of the player's cursor.

on_gui_closed.name: on_gui_closed
on_gui_closed.doc: Called when the player closes the GUI they have open.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

gui_type.name: gui_type
gui_type.doc: The GUI type that was open.

other_player.name: other_player
other_player.doc: The other player that was open

element.name: element
element.doc: The custom GUI element that was open

technology.name: technology
technology.doc: The technology that was automatically selected when opening the research GUI

tile_position.name: tile_position
tile_position.doc: The tile position that was open

inventory.name: inventory
inventory.doc: The script inventory that was open

on_gui_confirmed.name: on_gui_confirmed
on_gui_confirmed.doc: Called when a LuaGuiElement is confirmed, for example by pressing Enter in a textfield.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the confirming.

on_gui_elem_changed.name: on_gui_elem_changed
on_gui_elem_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement element value is changed (related to choose element buttons).

element.name: element
element.doc: The element whose element value changed.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

on_gui_hover.name: on_gui_hover
on_gui_hover.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement is hovered by the mouse.

element.name: element
element.doc: The element that is being hovered over.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player whose cursor is hovering.

on_gui_leave.name: on_gui_leave
on_gui_leave.doc: Called when the player's cursor leaves a LuaGuiElement that was previously hovered.

element.name: element
element.doc: The element that was being hovered.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player whose cursor was hovering.

on_gui_location_changed.name: on_gui_location_changed
on_gui_location_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement element location is changed (related to frames in player.gui.screen).

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

on_gui_opened.name: on_gui_opened
on_gui_opened.doc: Called when the player opens a GUI.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

gui_type.name: gui_type
gui_type.doc: The GUI type that was opened.

other_player.name: other_player
other_player.doc: The other player that was opened

element.name: element
element.doc: The custom GUI element that was opened

inventory.name: inventory
inventory.doc: The script inventory that was opened

on_gui_selected_tab_changed.name: on_gui_selected_tab_changed
on_gui_selected_tab_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement selected tab is changed (related to tabbed-panes).

element.name: element
element.doc: The tabbed pane whose selected tab changed.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

on_gui_selection_state_changed.name: on_gui_selection_state_changed
on_gui_selection_state_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement selection state is changed (related to drop-downs and listboxes).

element.name: element
element.doc: The element whose selection state changed.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

on_gui_switch_state_changed.name: on_gui_switch_state_changed
on_gui_switch_state_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement switch state is changed (related to switches).

element.name: element
element.doc: The switch whose switch state changed.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

on_gui_text_changed.name: on_gui_text_changed
on_gui_text_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement text is changed by the player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the edit.

text.name: text
text.doc: The new text in the element.

on_gui_value_changed.name: on_gui_value_changed
on_gui_value_changed.doc: Called when LuaGuiElement slider value is changed (related to the slider element).

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the change.

on_land_mine_armed.name: on_land_mine_armed
on_land_mine_armed.doc: Called when a land mine is armed.

on_lua_shortcut.name: on_lua_shortcut
on_lua_shortcut.doc: Called when a custom Lua shortcut is pressed.

prototype_name.name: prototype_name
prototype_name.doc: Shortcut prototype name of the shortcut that was clicked.

on_marked_for_deconstruction.name: on_marked_for_deconstruction
on_marked_for_deconstruction.doc: Called when an entity is marked for deconstruction with the Deconstruction planner or via script. Can be filtered using LuaEntityMarkedForDeconstructionEventFilter.

on_marked_for_upgrade.name: on_marked_for_upgrade
on_marked_for_upgrade.doc: Called when an entity is marked for upgrade with the Upgrade planner or via script. Can be filtered using LuaEntityMarkedForUpgradeEventFilter.

on_market_item_purchased.name: on_market_item_purchased
on_market_item_purchased.doc: Called after a player purchases some offer from a market entity.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the purchasing.

offer_index.name: offer_index
offer_index.doc: The index of the offer purchased.

on_mod_item_opened.name: on_mod_item_opened
on_mod_item_opened.doc: Called when the player uses the 'Open item GUI' control on an item defined with the 'mod-openable' flag

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_permission_group_added.name: on_permission_group_added
on_permission_group_added.doc: Called directly after a permission group is added.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that added the group.

on_permission_group_deleted.name: on_permission_group_deleted
on_permission_group_deleted.doc: Called directly after a permission group is deleted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the deletion.

id.name: id
id.doc: The group id that was deleted.

on_permission_group_edited.name: on_permission_group_edited
on_permission_group_edited.doc: Called directly after a permission group is edited in some way.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that did the editing.

action.name: action
action.doc: The action when the type is "add-permission" or "remove-permission".

other_player_index.name: other_player_index
other_player_index.doc: The other player when the type is "add-player" or "remove-player".

old_name.name: old_name
old_name.doc: The old group name when the type is "rename".

new_name.name: new_name
new_name.doc: The new group name when the type is "rename".

on_permission_string_imported.name: on_permission_string_imported
on_permission_string_imported.doc: Called directly after a permission string is imported.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that imported the string.

on_picked_up_item.name: on_picked_up_item
on_picked_up_item.doc: Called when a player picks up an item.

on_player_alt_reverse_selected_area.name: on_player_alt_reverse_selected_area
on_player_alt_reverse_selected_area.doc: Called after a player alt-reverse-selects an area with a selection-tool item.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the selection.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item used to select the area.

on_player_alt_selected_area.name: on_player_alt_selected_area
on_player_alt_selected_area.doc: Called after a player alt-selects an area with a selection-tool item.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the selection.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item used to select the area.

on_player_ammo_inventory_changed.name: on_player_ammo_inventory_changed
on_player_ammo_inventory_changed.doc: Called after a players ammo inventory changed in some way.

on_player_armor_inventory_changed.name: on_player_armor_inventory_changed
on_player_armor_inventory_changed.doc: Called after a players armor inventory changed in some way.

on_player_banned.name: on_player_banned
on_player_banned.doc: Called when a player is banned.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player banned.

by_player.name: by_player
by_player.doc: The player that did the banning if any.

on_player_built_tile.name: on_player_built_tile
on_player_built_tile.doc: Called after a player builds tiles.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface the tile(s) were built on.

tile.name: tile
tile.doc: The tile prototype that was placed.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item type used to build the tiles

stack.name: stack
stack.doc: The stack used to build the tiles (may be empty if all of the items where used to build the tiles).

on_player_cancelled_crafting.name: on_player_cancelled_crafting
on_player_cancelled_crafting.doc: Called when a player cancels crafting.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that did the crafting.

items.name: items
items.doc: The crafting items returned to the player's inventory.

recipe.name: recipe
recipe.doc: The recipe that has been cancelled.

cancel_count.name: cancel_count
cancel_count.doc: The number of crafts that have been cancelled.

on_player_changed_force.name: on_player_changed_force
on_player_changed_force.doc: Called after a player changes forces.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who changed forces.

on_player_changed_position.name: on_player_changed_position
on_player_changed_position.doc: Called when the tile position a player is located at changes.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_changed_surface.name: on_player_changed_surface
on_player_changed_surface.doc: Called after a player changes surfaces.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who changed surfaces.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface index the player was on.

on_player_cheat_mode_disabled.name: on_player_cheat_mode_disabled
on_player_cheat_mode_disabled.doc: Called when cheat mode is disabled on a player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_cheat_mode_enabled.name: on_player_cheat_mode_enabled
on_player_cheat_mode_enabled.doc: Called when cheat mode is enabled on a player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_clicked_gps_tag.name: on_player_clicked_gps_tag
on_player_clicked_gps_tag.doc: Called when a player clicks a gps tag

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: Index of the player

position.name: position
position.doc: Map position contained in gps tag

surface.name: surface
surface.doc: Surface name contained in gps tag, even when such surface does not exists

on_player_configured_blueprint.name: on_player_configured_blueprint
on_player_configured_blueprint.doc: Called when a player clicks the "confirm" button in the configure Blueprint GUI.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_configured_spider_remote.name: on_player_configured_spider_remote
on_player_configured_spider_remote.doc: Called when a player configures spidertron remote to be connected with a given spidertron

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that configured the remote.

vehicle.name: vehicle
vehicle.doc: Spider vehicle to which remote was connected to.

on_player_crafted_item.name: on_player_crafted_item
on_player_crafted_item.doc: Called when the player finishes crafting an item. This event fires just before the results are inserted into the player's inventory, not when the crafting is queued (see on_pre_player_crafted_item).

item_stack.name: item_stack
item_stack.doc: The item that has been crafted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the crafting.

recipe.name: recipe
recipe.doc: The recipe used to craft this item.

on_player_created.name: on_player_created
on_player_created.doc: Called after the player was created.

on_player_cursor_stack_changed.name: on_player_cursor_stack_changed
on_player_cursor_stack_changed.doc: Called after a player's cursor stack changed in some way. This is fired in the same tick that the change happens, but not instantly.

on_player_deconstructed_area.name: on_player_deconstructed_area
on_player_deconstructed_area.doc: Called when a player selects an area with a deconstruction planner.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the selection.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item used to select the area.

alt.name: alt
alt.doc: If normal selection or alt selection was used.

on_player_demoted.name: on_player_demoted
on_player_demoted.doc: Called when a player is demoted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_display_resolution_changed.name: on_player_display_resolution_changed
on_player_display_resolution_changed.doc: Called when the display resolution changes for a given player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player

on_player_display_scale_changed.name: on_player_display_scale_changed
on_player_display_scale_changed.doc: Called when the display scale changes for a given player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player

on_player_driving_changed_state.name: on_player_driving_changed_state
on_player_driving_changed_state.doc: Called when the player's driving state has changed, meaning a player has either entered or left a vehicle.

on_player_dropped_item.name: on_player_dropped_item
on_player_dropped_item.doc: Called when a player drops an item on the ground.

on_player_fast_transferred.name: on_player_fast_transferred
on_player_fast_transferred.doc: Called when a player fast-transfers something to or from an entity.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player transferred from or to.

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: The entity transferred from or to.

from_player.name: from_player
from_player.doc: Whether the transfer was from player to entity. If false, the transfer was from entity to player.

is_split.name: is_split
is_split.doc: Whether the transfer was a split action (half stack).

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: Index of the player

fluid.name: fluid
fluid.doc: Name of a fluid that was flushed

amount.name: amount
amount.doc: Amount of fluid that was removed

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: Entity from which flush was performed

only_this_entity.name: only_this_entity
only_this_entity.doc: True if flush was requested only on this entity

on_player_gun_inventory_changed.name: on_player_gun_inventory_changed
on_player_gun_inventory_changed.doc: Called after a players gun inventory changed in some way.

on_player_input_method_changed.name: on_player_input_method_changed
on_player_input_method_changed.doc: Called when a player's input method changes.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player whose input method changed.

on_player_joined_game.name: on_player_joined_game
on_player_joined_game.doc: Called after a player joins the game. This is not called when loading a save file in singleplayer, as the player doesn't actually leave the game, and the save is just on pause until they rejoin.

on_player_kicked.name: on_player_kicked
on_player_kicked.doc: Called when a player is kicked.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player kicked.

by_player.name: by_player
by_player.doc: The player that did the kicking if any.

on_player_left_game.name: on_player_left_game
on_player_left_game.doc: Called after a player leaves the game. This is not called when closing a save file in singleplayer, as the player doesn't actually leave the game, and the save is just on pause until they rejoin.

on_player_main_inventory_changed.name: on_player_main_inventory_changed
on_player_main_inventory_changed.doc: Called after a players main inventory changed in some way.

on_player_mined_entity.name: on_player_mined_entity
on_player_mined_entity.doc: Called after the results of an entity being mined are collected just before the entity is destroyed. After this event any items in the buffer will be transferred into the player as if they came from mining the entity. Can be filtered using LuaPlayerMinedEntityEventFilter.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The index of the player doing the mining.

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: The entity that has been mined.

buffer.name: buffer
buffer.doc: The temporary inventory that holds the result of mining the entity.

on_player_mined_item.name: on_player_mined_item
on_player_mined_item.doc: Called when the player mines something.

item_stack.name: item_stack
item_stack.doc: The item given to the player

on_player_mined_tile.name: on_player_mined_tile
on_player_mined_tile.doc: Called after a player mines tiles.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface the tile(s) were mined from.

on_player_muted.name: on_player_muted
on_player_muted.doc: Called when a player is muted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_pipette.name: on_player_pipette
on_player_pipette.doc: Called when a player invokes the "smart pipette" over an entity.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player

item.name: item
item.doc: The item put in the cursor

used_cheat_mode.name: used_cheat_mode
used_cheat_mode.doc: If cheat mode was used to give a free stack of the item.

on_player_placed_equipment.name: on_player_placed_equipment
on_player_placed_equipment.doc: Called after the player puts equipment in an equipment grid

equipment.name: equipment
equipment.doc: The equipment put in the equipment grid.

grid.name: grid
grid.doc: The equipment grid the equipment was put in.

on_player_promoted.name: on_player_promoted
on_player_promoted.doc: Called when a player is promoted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_removed.name: on_player_removed
on_player_removed.doc: Called when a player is removed (deleted) from the game. This is markedly different from a player temporarily leaving the game, and instead behaves like the player never existed in the save file.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The index of the removed player.

on_player_removed_equipment.name: on_player_removed_equipment
on_player_removed_equipment.doc: Called after the player removes equipment from an equipment grid

on_player_repaired_entity.name: on_player_repaired_entity
on_player_repaired_entity.doc: Called when a player repairs an entity. Can be filtered using LuaPlayerRepairedEntityEventFilter.

player_port.name: player_port
player_port.doc: The player port used to respawn if one was used.

on_player_reverse_selected_area.name: on_player_reverse_selected_area
on_player_reverse_selected_area.doc: Called after a player reverse-selects an area with a selection-tool item.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the selection.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item used to select the area.

on_player_rotated_entity.name: on_player_rotated_entity
on_player_rotated_entity.doc: Called when the player rotates an entity. This event is only fired when the entity actually changes its orientation -- pressing the rotate key on an entity that can't be rotated won't fire this event.

on_player_selected_area.name: on_player_selected_area
on_player_selected_area.doc: Called after a player selects an area with a selection-tool item.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the selection.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item used to select the area.

on_player_set_quick_bar_slot.name: on_player_set_quick_bar_slot
on_player_set_quick_bar_slot.doc: Called when a player sets a quickbar slot to anything (new value, or set to empty).

on_player_setup_blueprint.name: on_player_setup_blueprint
on_player_setup_blueprint.doc: Called when a player selects an area with a blueprint.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the selection.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item used to select the area.

alt.name: alt
alt.doc: If normal selection or alt selection was used.

mapping.name: mapping
mapping.doc: The blueprint entity index to source entity mapping. Note: if any mod changes the blueprint this will be incorrect.

on_player_toggled_alt_mode.name: on_player_toggled_alt_mode
on_player_toggled_alt_mode.doc: Called when a player toggles alt mode, also known as "show entity info".

alt_mode.name: alt_mode
alt_mode.doc: The new alt mode value. This value is a shortcut for accessing GameViewSettings::show_entity_info on the player.

on_player_toggled_map_editor.name: on_player_toggled_map_editor
on_player_toggled_map_editor.doc: Called when a player toggles the map editor on or off.

on_player_trash_inventory_changed.name: on_player_trash_inventory_changed
on_player_trash_inventory_changed.doc: Called after a players trash inventory changed in some way.

on_player_unbanned.name: on_player_unbanned
on_player_unbanned.doc: Called when a player is un-banned.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player un-banned.

by_player.name: by_player
by_player.doc: The player that did the un-banning if any.

reason.name: reason
reason.doc: The reason the player was banned if any.

on_player_unmuted.name: on_player_unmuted
on_player_unmuted.doc: Called when a player is unmuted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

on_player_used_capsule.name: on_player_used_capsule
on_player_used_capsule.doc: Called when a player uses a capsule that results in some game action.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player.

position.name: position
position.doc: The position the capsule was used.

on_player_used_spider_remote.name: on_player_used_spider_remote
on_player_used_spider_remote.doc: Called when a player uses spidertron remote to send a spidertron to a given position

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that used the remote.

vehicle.name: vehicle
vehicle.doc: Spider vehicle which was requested to move.

position.name: position
position.doc: Goal position to which spidertron was sent to.

success.name: success
success.doc: If the use was successful. It may fail when spidertron has different driver or when player is on different surface.

on_post_entity_died.name: on_post_entity_died
on_post_entity_died.doc: Called after an entity dies. Can be filtered using LuaPostEntityDiedEventFilter.

ghost.name: ghost
ghost.doc: The ghost created by the entity dying if any.

force.name: force
force.doc: The force that did the killing if any.

prototype.name: prototype
prototype.doc: The entity prototype of the entity that died.

corpses.name: corpses
corpses.doc: The corpses created by the entity dying if any.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface the entity was on.

unit_number.name: unit_number
unit_number.doc: The unit number the entity had if any.

on_pre_build.name: on_pre_build
on_pre_build.doc: Called when players uses an item to build something. Called before on_built_entity.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who did the placing.

shift_build.name: shift_build
shift_build.doc: Item was placed using shift building.

direction.name: direction
direction.doc: The direction the item was facing when placed.

flip_horizontal.name: flip_horizontal
flip_horizontal.doc: Whether the blueprint was flipped horizontally. nil if not built by a blueprint.

flip_vertical.name: flip_vertical
flip_vertical.doc: Whether the blueprint was flipped vertically. nil if not built by a blueprint.

created_by_moving.name: created_by_moving
created_by_moving.doc: Whether the item was placed while moving.

on_pre_chunk_deleted.name: on_pre_chunk_deleted
on_pre_chunk_deleted.doc: Called before one or more chunks are deleted using LuaSurface::delete_chunk.

on_pre_entity_settings_pasted.name: on_pre_entity_settings_pasted
on_pre_entity_settings_pasted.doc: Called before entity copy-paste is done.

source.name: source
source.doc: The source entity settings will be copied from.

destination.name: destination
destination.doc: The destination entity settings will be copied to.

on_pre_ghost_deconstructed.name: on_pre_ghost_deconstructed
on_pre_ghost_deconstructed.doc: Called before a ghost entity is destroyed as a result of being marked for deconstruction. Also called for item request proxies before they are destroyed as a result of being marked for deconstruction. Can be filtered using LuaPreGhostDeconstructedEventFilter.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that did the deconstruction if any.

on_pre_ghost_upgraded.name: on_pre_ghost_upgraded
on_pre_ghost_upgraded.doc: Called before a ghost entity is upgraded. Can be filtered using LuaPreGhostUpgradedEventFilter.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that did the upgrade if any.

on_pre_permission_group_deleted.name: on_pre_permission_group_deleted
on_pre_permission_group_deleted.doc: Called directly before a permission group is deleted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the deletion.

on_pre_permission_string_imported.name: on_pre_permission_string_imported
on_pre_permission_string_imported.doc: Called directly before a permission string is imported.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player importing the string.

on_pre_player_crafted_item.name: on_pre_player_crafted_item
on_pre_player_crafted_item.doc: Called when a player queues something to be crafted.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player doing the crafting.

items.name: items
items.doc: The items removed from the players inventory to do the crafting.

queued_count.name: queued_count
queued_count.doc: The number of times the recipe is being queued.

on_pre_player_left_game.name: on_pre_player_left_game
on_pre_player_left_game.doc: Called before a player leaves the game.

on_pre_player_mined_item.name: on_pre_player_mined_item
on_pre_player_mined_item.doc: Called when the player completes a mining action, but before the entity is potentially removed from the map. This is called even if the entity does not end up being removed. Can be filtered using LuaPrePlayerMinedEntityEventFilter.

on_pre_player_removed.name: on_pre_player_removed
on_pre_player_removed.doc: Called before a player is removed (deleted) from the game. This is markedly different from a player temporarily leaving the game, and instead behaves like the player never existed in the save file.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The index of the removed player.

on_pre_player_toggled_map_editor.name: on_pre_player_toggled_map_editor
on_pre_player_toggled_map_editor.doc: Called before a player toggles the map editor on or off.

on_pre_robot_exploded_cliff.name: on_pre_robot_exploded_cliff
on_pre_robot_exploded_cliff.doc: Called directly before a robot explodes cliffs.

on_pre_script_inventory_resized.name: on_pre_script_inventory_resized
on_pre_script_inventory_resized.doc: Called just before a script inventory is resized.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: If done by console command; the player who ran the command.

mod.name: mod
mod.doc: The mod that did the resizing. This will be "core" if done by console command or scenario script.

on_pre_surface_cleared.name: on_pre_surface_cleared
on_pre_surface_cleared.doc: Called just before a surface is cleared (all entities removed and all chunks deleted).

on_pre_surface_deleted.name: on_pre_surface_deleted
on_pre_surface_deleted.doc: Called just before a surface is deleted.

research.name: research
research.doc: A mapping of technology name to how many times it was cancelled.

force.name: force
force.doc: The force whose research was cancelled.

by_script.name: by_script
by_script.doc: If the technology was researched by script.

on_research_reversed.name: on_research_reversed
on_research_reversed.doc: Called when a research is reversed (unresearched).

by_script.name: by_script
by_script.doc: If the technology was un-researched by script.

on_research_started.name: on_research_started
on_research_started.doc: Called when a technology research starts.

on_resource_depleted.name: on_resource_depleted
on_resource_depleted.doc: Called when a resource entity reaches 0 or its minimum yield for infinite resources.

on_robot_built_entity.name: on_robot_built_entity
on_robot_built_entity.doc: Called when a construction robot builds an entity. Can be filtered using LuaRobotBuiltEntityEventFilter.

robot.name: robot
robot.doc: The robot that did the building.

stack.name: stack
stack.doc: The item used to do the building.

tags.name: tags
tags.doc: The tags associated with this entity if any.

on_robot_built_tile.name: on_robot_built_tile
on_robot_built_tile.doc: Called after a robot builds tiles.

tile.name: tile
tile.doc: The tile prototype that was placed.

item.name: item
item.doc: The item type used to build the tiles.

stack.name: stack
stack.doc: The stack used to build the tiles (may be empty if all of the items where used to build the tiles).

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface the tile(s) are build on.

on_robot_exploded_cliff.name: on_robot_exploded_cliff
on_robot_exploded_cliff.doc: Called directly after a robot explodes cliffs.

on_robot_mined.name: on_robot_mined
on_robot_mined.doc: Called when a robot mines an entity.

robot.name: robot
robot.doc: The robot that did the mining.

item_stack.name: item_stack
item_stack.doc: The entity the robot just picked up.

on_robot_mined_entity.name: on_robot_mined_entity
on_robot_mined_entity.doc: Called after the results of an entity being mined are collected just before the entity is destroyed. After this event any items in the buffer will be transferred into the robot as if they came from mining the entity. Can be filtered using LuaRobotMinedEntityEventFilter.

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: The entity that has been mined.

buffer.name: buffer
buffer.doc: The temporary inventory that holds the result of mining the entity.

on_robot_mined_tile.name: on_robot_mined_tile
on_robot_mined_tile.doc: Called after a robot mines tiles.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface the tile(s) were mined on.

on_robot_pre_mined.name: on_robot_pre_mined
on_robot_pre_mined.doc: Called before a robot mines an entity. Can be filtered using LuaPreRobotMinedEntityEventFilter.

robot.name: robot
robot.doc: The robot that's about to do the mining.

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: The entity which is about to be mined.

on_rocket_launch_ordered.name: on_rocket_launch_ordered
on_rocket_launch_ordered.doc: Called when a rocket silo is ordered to be launched.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that is riding the rocket, if any.

on_rocket_launched.name: on_rocket_launched
on_rocket_launched.doc: Called when the rocket is launched.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player that is riding the rocket, if any.

on_runtime_mod_setting_changed.name: on_runtime_mod_setting_changed
on_runtime_mod_setting_changed.doc: Called when a runtime mod setting is changed by a player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: If the setting_type is "global" and it was changed through the mod settings GUI, this is the index of the player that changed the global setting. If the setting_type is "runtime-per-user" and it changed a current setting of the player, this is the index of the player whose setting was changed. In all other cases, this is nil.

setting.name: setting
setting.doc: The prototype name of the setting that was changed.

on_script_inventory_resized.name: on_script_inventory_resized
on_script_inventory_resized.doc: Called just after a script inventory is resized.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: If done by console command; the player who ran the command.

mod.name: mod
mod.doc: The mod that did the resizing. This will be "core" if done by console command or scenario script.

overflow_inventory.name: overflow_inventory
overflow_inventory.doc: Any items which didn't fit into the new inventory size.

on_script_path_request_finished.name: on_script_path_request_finished
on_script_path_request_finished.doc: Called when a LuaSurface::request_path call completes.

path.name: path
path.doc: The actual path that the pathfinder has determined. nil if pathfinding failed.

id.name: id
id.doc: Handle to associate the callback with a particular call to LuaSurface::request_path.

try_again_later.name: try_again_later
try_again_later.doc: Indicates that the pathfinder failed because it is too busy, and that you can retry later.

on_script_trigger_effect.name: on_script_trigger_effect
on_script_trigger_effect.doc: Called when a script trigger effect is triggered.

effect_id.name: effect_id
effect_id.doc: The effect_id specified in the trigger effect.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface the effect happened on.

on_sector_scanned.name: on_sector_scanned
on_sector_scanned.doc: Called when an entity of type radar finishes scanning a sector. Can be filtered for the radar using LuaSectorScannedEventFilter.

radar.name: radar
radar.doc: The radar that did the scanning.

on_selected_entity_changed.name: on_selected_entity_changed
on_selected_entity_changed.doc: Called after the selected entity changes for a given player.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player whose selected entity changed.

last_entity.name: last_entity
last_entity.doc: The last selected entity if it still exists and there was one.

on_spider_command_completed.name: on_spider_command_completed
on_spider_command_completed.doc: Called when a spider finishes moving to its autopilot position.

vehicle.name: vehicle
vehicle.doc: Spider vehicle which was requested to move.

on_string_translated.name: on_string_translated
on_string_translated.doc: Called when a translation request generated through LuaPlayer::request_translation or LuaPlayer::request_translations has been completed.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player whose locale was used for the translation.

id.name: id
id.doc: The unique id for this translation request.

translated.name: translated
translated.doc: Whether the requested localised string was valid and could be translated.

on_surface_cleared.name: on_surface_cleared
on_surface_cleared.doc: Called just after a surface is cleared (all entities removed and all chunks deleted).

on_surface_created.name: on_surface_created
on_surface_created.doc: Called when a surface is created.

on_surface_deleted.name: on_surface_deleted
on_surface_deleted.doc: Called after a surface is deleted.

on_surface_imported.name: on_surface_imported
on_surface_imported.doc: Called after a surface is imported via the map editor.

on_surface_renamed.name: on_surface_renamed
on_surface_renamed.doc: Called when a surface is renamed.

on_tick.name: on_tick
on_tick.doc: It is fired once every tick. Since this event is fired every tick, its handler shouldn't include performance heavy code.

on_train_changed_state.name: on_train_changed_state
on_train_changed_state.doc: Called when a train changes state (started to stopped and vice versa)

on_train_created.name: on_train_created
on_train_created.doc: Called when a new train is created either through disconnecting/connecting an existing one or building a new one.

old_train_id_1.name: old_train_id_1
old_train_id_1.doc: The first old train id when splitting/merging trains.

old_train_id_2.name: old_train_id_2
old_train_id_2.doc: The second old train id when splitting/merging trains.

on_train_schedule_changed.name: on_train_schedule_changed
on_train_schedule_changed.doc: Called when a trains schedule is changed either by the player or through script.

player_index.name: player_index
player_index.doc: The player who made the change if any.

on_trigger_created_entity.name: on_trigger_created_entity
on_trigger_created_entity.doc: Called when an entity with a trigger prototype (such as capsules) create an entity AND that trigger prototype defined trigger_created_entity="true".

on_trigger_fired_artillery.name: on_trigger_fired_artillery
on_trigger_fired_artillery.doc: Called when an entity with a trigger prototype (such as capsules) fire an artillery projectile AND that trigger prototype defined trigger_fired_artillery="true".

on_unit_added_to_group.name: on_unit_added_to_group
on_unit_added_to_group.doc: Called when a unit is added to a unit group.

on_unit_group_created.name: on_unit_group_created
on_unit_group_created.doc: Called when a new unit group is created, before any members are added to it.

on_unit_group_finished_gathering.name: on_unit_group_finished_gathering
on_unit_group_finished_gathering.doc: Called when a unit group finishes gathering and starts executing its command.

on_unit_removed_from_group.name: on_unit_removed_from_group
on_unit_removed_from_group.doc: Called when a unit is removed from a unit group.

on_worker_robot_expired.name: on_worker_robot_expired
on_worker_robot_expired.doc: Called when a worker (construction or logistic) robot expires through a lack of energy.

script_raised_built.name: script_raised_built
script_raised_built.doc: A static event mods can use to tell other mods they built something by script. This event is only raised if a mod does so with LuaBootstrap::raise_event or LuaBootstrap::raise_script_built, or when raise_built is passed to LuaSurface::create_entity. Can be filtered using LuaScriptRaisedBuiltEventFilter.

entity.name: entity
entity.doc: The entity that has been built.

script_raised_destroy.name: script_raised_destroy
script_raised_destroy.doc: A static event mods can use to tell other mods they destroyed something by script. This event is only raised if a mod does so with LuaBootstrap::raise_event or LuaBootstrap::raise_script_destroy, or when raise_destroy is passed to LuaEntity::destroy. Can be filtered using LuaScriptRaisedDestroyEventFilter.

script_raised_revive.name: script_raised_revive
script_raised_revive.doc: A static event mods can use to tell other mods they revived something by script. This event is only raised if a mod does so with LuaBootstrap::raise_event or LuaBootstrap::raise_script_revive, or when raise_revive is passed to LuaEntity::revive. Can be filtered using LuaScriptRaisedReviveEventFilter.

tags.name: tags
tags.doc: The tags associated with this entity, if any.

script_raised_set_tiles.name: script_raised_set_tiles
script_raised_set_tiles.doc: A static event mods can use to tell other mods they changed tiles on a surface by script. This event is only raised if a mod does so with LuaBootstrap::raise_event or LuaBootstrap::raise_script_set_tiles, or when raise_event is passed to LuaSurface::set_tiles.

surface_index.name: surface_index
surface_index.doc: The surface whose tiles were changed.

script_raised_teleported.name: script_raised_teleported
script_raised_teleported.doc: A static event mods can use to tell other mods they teleported something by script. This event is only raised if a mod does so with LuaBootstrap::raise_event or LuaBootstrap::raise_script_teleported, or when raise_teleported is passed to LuaControl::teleport. Can be filtered using LuaScriptRaisedTeleportedEventFilter.

old_surface_index.name: old_surface_index
old_surface_index.doc: The entity's surface before the teleportation.

old_position.name: old_position
old_position.doc: The entity's position before the teleportation.
